metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6806 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The MScrollV function in ansi.c in GNU screen 4.3.1 and earlier does not properly limit recursion, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack consumption) via an escape sequence with a large repeat count value. It was discovered that GNU screen mishandled certain crafted input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: screen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
